subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Mr Walter,

I have waited for your response until now without any comment from you .

 Meanwhile kindly note that I will be leaving to London UK by tomorrow  on
urgent official assignment and once I arrive there , I  will forward you my
telephone number so that you can call me

Due confirm the receipt of this email.

Yours sincerely brother
Russell

subject: Are you dead now ??? If no, get back to me now...
body:
Are you dead now ??? If no, get back to me now...

Russell

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Arrived in London UK and you can reach me on this number.


Russell

subject: Good news / call me immediately
body:
Hello Walter

I have a good news for you , call me immediately on +447452234362

Waiting urgently for your call.

Yours sincerely brother
Russell
